customColumn1.label: Delete Listing
customColumn1.onClick: {{deleteListing.run(() => showAlert('Listing Deleted. Refresh','info'), () => showAlert('Error deleting listing','error'))}}

children.text: See all orders for a seller
Add a new review response for listing review ID: {{reviewsTable.selectedRow.reviewId}}

children.onClick: {{newReviewResponse.run(() => showAlert('Review response added','info'), () => showAlert('Error adding review response','error'))}}
